data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brandão, Carlos Roberto F., Feitosa, Rodrigo M., Powell, Scott, Del-Claro, Kleber (2014): Description of Cephalotes specularis n. sp. (Formicidae: Myrmicinae) — the mirror turtle ant. Zootaxa 3796 (3): 568-578, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3796.3.9
